title: Washington Firm Recalls Boneless Beef Trim Product Due To Possible E. Coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 28, 2015 Washington Beef, LLC, a Toppenish, Wash., establishment, is recalling 1,620 pounds of boneless beef trim product that may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today.The following boneless beef product...
